statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE program_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, program_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE age < 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM student_enrollment WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE program_name = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, program_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE age < 30 AND program_name LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, program_name FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id WHERE program_type = 'Engineering';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, program_id FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id WHERE program_type = 'Engineering';
SELECT student_name, program_name FROM students JOIN programs ON students.program_id = programs.program_id WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE program_id IN (SELECT program_id FROM programs WHERE program_type = 'Science');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, enrolled_program FROM Students WHERE age <= 25;
SELECT program_name, location FROM Programs WHERE age_group = 'Adults';
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, enrolled_program FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id WHERE Students.age < 25;
SELECT program_name, location FROM Programs WHERE age_group = 'Adult' ORDER BY program_name ASC;

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id WHERE Students.enrolled_program = 'Computer Science';

SELECT Students.first_name, Students.last_name, Programs.program_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Programs ON Enrollments.program_id = Programs.program_id WHERE Students.age >= 18 AND Programs.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name, speciality FROM Teachers;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 5 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_name FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE s.age < 25 AND c.course_duration < 10;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students
SELECT name, age, grade_level FROM Students WHERE age > 20
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Programs
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT Students.name, Enrollments.enrollment_date, Programs.program_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Programs ON Enrollments.program_id = Programs.program_id;

SELECT Programs.program_name, COUNT(Enrollments.program_id) AS total_enrollments FROM Enrollments JOIN Programs ON Enrollments.program_id = Programs.program_id GROUP BY Programs.program_name HAVING total_enrollments > 5;

SELECT Teachers.name, Classrooms.location, Programs.program_name FROM Teachers JOIN Classrooms ON Teachers.teacher_id = Classrooms.teacher_id JOIN Programs ON Classrooms.program_id = Programs.program_id ORDER BY Teachers.name, Programs.program_name;

SELECT Students.name AS student_name, Programs.program_name AS program_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date AS enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Programs ON Enrollments.program_id = Programs.program_id;
